Articles.Content:
Post the name of your first mod, a couple of screenshots and a description of what it was supposed to be/do.

- - - Updated - - -

I'll start off.

Fried's New Fuel Tank

![o2N4ixnh.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/o2N4ixnh.jpg)

A simple test to see if I was capable of making a working part mod on a macintosh computer. Unfortunately I used the wrong .cfg file to base it on and the part came out the wrong size and with the attachment nodes in the wrong place.

Nice! Keep tweaking your .cfg file and soon you'll learn what each parameter do and how they affect your model and nodes and you'll get it just right! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Keep trying ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
